contents: Notes Adjust the quantity of raspberries and sugar within the provided ranges based on your preferred sweetness and tartness.
title: Raspberry Ice Cream

contents: Notes The alternating addition of eggs, flour, and dates helps create a uniform batter texture. The sauce should be stirred constantly while boiling to prevent burning.
title: Sticky Toffee Pudding

contents: Notes The coulis and custard will soften the tarts due to remaining moisture so only add close to serving time.
title: Strawberry Tarts

contents: Notes Wear gloves when de seeding chillis to avoid burning sensation on your fingers for a few hours. Ensure the chocolate mixture has cooled sufficiently before adding to the eggs to avoid scrambling them.
title: Chilli Brownies

contents: Notes Chilling: This helps prevent the cookies from spreading out too much in the oven and makes shaping them easier too.
title: Peanut Butter Cookies

contents: Notes Just pushing down on one side of a bagel while its boiling should flip it.
title: Bagels
